content: On the call last quarter, I said we’d be initiating the marketing of our connected device products, specifically device hardening and square one. Throughout 2021, and into the first quarter of 2022 we invested in the development of the two new product offerings announced in late 2021 Square One a secure device management solution and device hardening solution to configure operating systems for IoT deployments. A digital search campaign intended to drive web site activity and improve our product visibility, and the publication of a series of thought leadership content highlighting the BSQUARE’s position on industry trends and topics including cybersecurity, IoT lifecycle management, and cost saving for device makers.
